TopicTitle: Sudden explosions in mun orbit (hyperedit support)

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I'm getting what I think is a bug when I use hyperedit.

I use the alt-H>Orbit editor tool

then I put in:

orbit hight: 5000

Body: mun

then I hit "set" , and my ship explodes.

any help?

Ubuntu 14.04 LTS

intel core 2 quad 6600

nvidea geforce 9600 gt.

The Mun's highest elevation is a little over 7000 meters, according to the KSP Wiki: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Mun

Try hyperediting your craft to a 10,000 meter orbit instead, you may be colliding with the surface when you hyperedit there.

Also, with Hyperedit, I find that gradually editing my craft to a place is a lot safer than going from point A to point B instantly. It gives objects the opportunity and time to load. For example, it's dangerous to jump from the launchpad to descending to the surface of Laythe. What I suggest for the Mun is to edit from Launchpad->Low Kerbin Orbit->Medium Mun Orbit (50km)->Low Mun Orbit (I do not recommend going lower than 7500m).
